title: Payments to public bodies
context: ยง206-36 Payments to public bodies. The board of land and natural resources may agree to make such payments to the State, or any political subdivision thereof (which payments such bodies may accept), as the board finds consistent with the achievement of the purposes of this chapter. [L 1961, c 6, ยง34; Supp, ยง98J-34; HRS ยง206-36]
